column1: The Pit Room////Aside from the giant line in the middle of the restaurant
column2: the ambiance was very clean and modern feeling. Definitely not a classic hole-in-the wall/order through a window kind of barbecue
column3: but not high end by any means. I did like how
column5: you order and they cut up your meat and weight it right in front of you
column6: which was a fun part of the experience!
